CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Audio response strength (X: bass level, Y: bass hits)
CONTROLS.NAME: bass_mix

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Audio response curve (higher = more intense reaction)
CONTROLS.NAME: bass_pow

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Media opacity â€“ fade media fx in or out
CONTROLS.NAME: media_opacity

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Plays your media straight-ahead or circularly warped centered on the pyramid.
CONTROLS.NAME: media_mode

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Scale media's XY to stretch the media into different shapes.
CONTROLS.NAME: scale_media

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Frame blending amount (0 = sharp, 1 = heavy trails)
CONTROLS.NAME: motion_blur

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Camera movement speed (X: linear time, Y: bass time)
CONTROLS.NAME: travel_speed

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Intensity of spectrum bars at horizon (0 = hidden, 1 = full)
CONTROLS.NAME: bar_visibility

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Vertical position of spectrum bars on horizon
CONTROLS.NAME: bar_height

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Overall color scheme rotation (shifts entire palette hue)
CONTROLS.NAME: hue_offset

DESCRIPTION: Dive into an infinite neon tunnel as you travel toward the legendary Pyramid of Giza, reimagined in a synthwave dimension. Glowing purple and pink arcs spiral through space, pulsing with audio-reactive energy. The scene responds dynamically to bass frequencies, transforming every beat into a hypnotic journey through this retro-futuristic desert dreamscape.
TITLE: Neon giza_dup
